verses.verse: So Abijah <S%H29><s%> slept <S%H7901><s%> with his fathers, <S%H1><s%> and they buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the city <S%H5892><s%> of David: <S%H1732><s%> and Asa <S%H609><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in his stead. <S%H8478><s%> In his days <S%H3117><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> was quiet <S%H8252><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
